Uses of Class
oracle.soda.OracleException

  • Packages that use OracleException 
    Package Description
    oracle.soda
    Contains the core SODA interfaces and classes.
    oracle.soda.rdbms
    Contains RDBMS-specific SODA interfaces and classes.
